programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Jessica decides to set up a charity foundation in Adam's memory. James has to prove himself worthy of Ananya to the Bala kids. Meanwhile, Ananya makes the list of top ten CEOs in Asia, much to Jessica's chagrin.

programme.title: The Resident S2
programme.desc: When Bell makes the executive call to utilize Julian Booth's medical devices, rather than the hospital's usual products, Kit and AJ must stop their momentary feuding in order to team up against him. Conrad and Nic work to make a child's dreams come true after finding out his cancer has returned.

programme.title: The Noise S1
programme.desc: To succeed in THE NOISE, teams of contestants must complete seemingly easy challenges without making a single sound. Can they pedal a bicycle or unzip a sports bag or open a can of coke while staying completely quiet?

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Mata Mata S2
programme.desc: Faced with new discoveries, Margaret is determined to arrest the mastermind behind the Wee Murders and she ropes in the help of others. Shanti finds herself in a dilemma between love and her career while deciding whether or not to pursue her dream of becoming a lawyer. Meanwhile, when a young woman is found dead in a deserted spot, her boyfriend and a married man are both under investigation.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's France
programme.desc: In the eighth episode of Luke Nguyen's France, Luke explores the country's southwest sampling Basque delicacies in Biarritz and oysters on the island of Oleron. In Biarritz, Luke discovers the key ingredients in Basque cuisine - Espelette pepper and artisan jambon - with chefs Eric and Sebastian.

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking And Carry On
programme.desc: Jamie brings us his most ingenious, delicious ways to use up those kitchen cupboard staples and back-of-the- freezer forgotten finds. He teaches us how to make great use of what we already have in our fridges and cupboards, and where we can make swaps in recipes when we have missing ingredients. More pragmatic and enjoyable than ever, Jamie demonstrates simple ways to make surprisingly delicious meals out of pantry classics.

programme.title: Ellen's Game Of Games S3
programme.desc: New season of the popular and fun gameshow. Volunteers from Ellen's studio audience play her outrageously fun games including Stink Tank, Aw Snap!, One Eyed Monster, Don't Leave Me Hanging, Know or Go and more for the chance to win $100,000.

programme.title: Magic Adventures: The Crystal of Dark
programme.desc: A young princess Olivia is transported to many wondrous lands and along the way she teams up with allies. Together they embark on a dangerous quest to find 4 great wizards and 7 magic crystals that will help her stop the Dark wizard and save her parents, and they learn that real magic is having good virtues of courage, friendship, and cooperation.

programme.title: Pokemon the Series: Sun & Moon - Ultra Legends S22
programme.desc: This season follows the final adventures of Ash Ketchum and his classmates at the Pokemon school in the Alola region.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S2
programme.desc: A monster truck and his human driver go on adventures together while learning about science, technology, engineering and math.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3
programme.desc: Go Jetters go bigger as our plucky international heroes Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz, together with their disco-grooving mentor Ubercorn, discover lots more about our world. And we learn much more about each of the Go Jetters too. Travelling from the top of the planet to the very bottom, their action-packed adventures take them to truly incredible places. And there's a good chance Grandmaster Glitch has got there first to cause his usual chaos!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S5
programme.desc: The Far East Village is up for the 'Best Village Ever' Award. They've got a real chance of winning, except for one tiny problem...well 2 actually. Can these 2 villagers improve themselves, or cause the entire village to lose? The children travel to Outer Space to meet Mr. Astronaut's daughter for the first time. Tim's perception of what girls are like is challenged.

programme.title: Titipo the Little Train S2
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, Diesel happens to meet an engineer. The engineer asks for help, saying his steam locomotive is out of order. Diesel helps the engineer carry his luggage and suddenly he flies high up into the sky!

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: Ollie's busy. So busy that he accepts the aliens' time changing watch to help him catch up with everything he has going on. But when he takes time manipulation too far, he will have to act fast to save his friend Triangle Man before it's too late. The squares want to give the alien a birthday present. They don't have any money and decide to upcycle their only toy car and give that as a gift. After all the best kind of gift is the one that comes from the heart. Isn't it?

programme.title: 触心罪探
programme.desc: Frank好友（John）与妻子离奇跳楼自杀，Frank怀疑John加入了黎明教才会寻短，把遗产全数捐给不明慈善机构。Jasmine瞒着Frank，和王子一同潜入黎明教，被光明使Irene受邀参加John的告别仪式。CFI以家属名义出席告别仪式，惊见本来请了假的王子..

programme.title: 狮城有约

programme.title: 邻里帮
programme.desc: Satay King得知Sophie将母亲的死归罪于两人的婚事后，深感不安，再次上门劝导。Satay King重申Rosie是死于心脏病，跟Sophie结不结婚毫无关系。Sophie执迷不悟，Satay King严责Sophie，要她走出悲伤，好好想想自己的未来.

programme.title: 爸比，我挺你
programme.desc: 今天接受挑战的是音乐老师龚振良和儿子顗乐。他们参加比赛的原因是什么？与他们同场较劲的还有电台DJ高逸芯的先生罗伟健和女儿婉嫣，他们有什么温馨小故事可以分享？讲得一口标准华语的逸芯，平时对女儿有什么不为人知的要求？最终哪组家庭能突破重围，脱颖而出.

programme.title: 多年后的全家福
programme.desc: 1997年，8岁的叶健康在年除夕前夕被拐走，20多年以来，一家没放弃寻找他的下落。终于，妹妹叶平安通过DNA寻亲网站找到哥哥，弟弟叶康乐也因为哥哥回来了，隐瞒父亲放弃学业追求自己的梦想。但是与平安青梅竹马的蔡丰收始终不信寻获的哥哥是自己的儿时玩伴， 甚至认为他和平安之间出现第三者..

programme.desc: (重)《声音的抉择》每两期会邀请一位华语乐坛制作人化身声音委托人来到现场，阐述自己的创作理念及择声的标准，通过这个平台为自己最新创作的优质单曲寻找契合的好声音；与此同时，每期节目中声音猎人推荐六位职业歌手，他们作为金曲试唱人站上《声音的抉择》的舞台向声音委托人和观众展示其真挚的歌声，同时借助这个平台寻找契合自己声音的旋律、寻找下一首成名曲。.
